it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server

Class GamesTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server.GamesTimer

  • public class GamesTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    The big timer of the timer. It serves two main purposes: deleting a game where not enough players connected to start playing and creating the turn timer class for a single game. For more information about that please read the documentation of TurnTimer.
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GamesTimer()
      Constructor for the GamesTimer, initializes a new timer and the map of turn timers for each game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GamesTimer

        public GamesTimer()
        Constructor for the GamesTimer, initializes a new timer and the map of turn timers for each game. (Remember, one turn time per game, that's why it is in the controller package).
